{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AsiaRF |model=AWM |revision=002 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/26/2013 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=mini module |fcc_id=TKZAWM002 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350;RT5350F, TPBV956409, 1216STA1; |cpu1_cspeed=360 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (pins) |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350;RT5350F, TPBV956409, 1216STA1; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|WiFi AP Router Module}} :[http://www.asiarf.com/Smallest-Tiny-Ralink-802-11n-Wireless-AP-Router-Module-Board-AWM002-product-view-375.html Product page] *[https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/asiarf-tiny-linux-computer-with-wifi-and-ethernet ''AsiaRF'''s ''Indiegogo'' project] Flash/RAM may vary, defaults are specified as 8 MB/32 MB :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TKZ/AWM002 TKZAWM002]
*[http://www.cnx-software.com/2014/04/28/15-asiarf-awm002-awm003-wi-fi-modules-run-openwrt-expose-gpios/ ''AsiaRF AWM002 & AWM003 Wi-Fi Modules'' on '''CNX-Software'''] :*SoC: [[Ralink]] RT5350 @360MHz ([[MIPS 24KEc]]) ::1T1R 802.11bgn Wi-Fi (150Mbps) *[https://openwrt.org/toh/asiarf/awm-evb ''AsiaRF AWM-EVB, AWM002, AWM003'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :See also [[AsiaRF AP2620]].. [http://www.asiarf.com/IoT-Home-Automation-Sever-WiFi-11n-MT7620-High-Speed-Multi-Functions-Router-Board-AP2620-P-product-view-388.html PPage] ([https://openwrt.org/toh/asiarf/awm-evb ''AP2620'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki])
